title: Army Encampment
medium: Graphite, brush and watercolor on cream-colored wove paper
description: Horizontal view of an army encampment showing tents at right and left, in foreground; a line of tethered horses, in left middle ground; and additional tents suggested in background; verso: sketches of human and horse legs.
name: Drawing
